original_title: The Tallest Man On Earth: The Little Red Barn Show
overview: In September 2020 during a period of eased restrictions between lockdowns, Kristian Matsson played two shows for 50 people in his friends' barn in the Swedish countryside. This film documents these evenings; it's 70% a concert and 30% a documentary about people, horses, big machines, line dance, crops and a beautiful man who cooks pumpkin soup.
title: The Tallest Man On Earth: The Little Red Barn Show
